name: Font Titans
description: This is a quick prototype of a game I've wanted to make for a while. It is based off an old iOS game called Font Monsters developed by MuuMuu way back in 2010, which doesn't exist anymore. I thought I'd try my hand at the base gameplay, but make it bigger and 3D. I call this guy El Qwerty. I miss Font Monsters, so hopefully I'll continue with this and make a full fledged demo. Original mesh (now invisible) and animation from Mixamo.
